summary: Experienced software engineer, and hands-on engineering manager with 20+ years of product development experience in broadcast media, and 10+ years of experience in leading development teams (20+ engineers), hiring (10+ offers, 40+ interviews), HR personnel procedures, performance reviews, and project transitions.

experience.title: Software Engineering Manager
experience.description: Led Nexio video server applications across multiple sites; adopted Scrum since 2014; migrated source control to Mercurial and Jenkins; delivered Nexio Software Suite 6.0-8.0 and Global Proxy Suite 2.5-3.5; initiated SOA with 2 web services and 10 services; developed Content Manager, Helper, Picon, and Requestor services; evolved services: Encoder, GPRX, Helios, MB, Scavenger, Transcoder; published REST API and URI specifications and 10 JSON protocol API documents; generated a scalable UMID-based workflow for primary-backup scenarios; received Reuse Innovation Award for IP reuse.

experience.title: Software Engineering Manager
experience.description: Development and team management for Nexio editing applications; built core editing team to size 8 and coordinated with Beijing; established development process documentation and peer code review guidelines; implemented crash dump analysis for hard-to-reproduce issues; released Video Editing Suite 2.5; developed server integration modules for video broadcast workflows.

experience.title: Principal Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected, designed, and implemented DLL components for evolution of a video editing product; built interactive playback architecture; developed media file reader/writer components; created scalable decoder/encoder architectures; developed video and audio rendering engines; built hardware integration modules; performed 64-bit and Unicode migration affecting over 4 million lines of code.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Star Media startup; created Velocity video editing software for post-production; projects included project media management tools, Render Bank, and video effects.
